caption:
Our ‘Back to Earth’ Limited Edition Design is proving popular! 🌍

Actually design No. 12 from ‘back in the day’, it is inspired by our wonderful Mother Earth, and the design is our take on The Blue Marble.

Filled as always with our fabulously fast-absorbing, steam-infused Original Steamcream. 

Available now on our website! ✨
